Arnor.bonus: Friendly Arnor models automatically pass Courage tests whilst within 6" of Arvedui, Last King Of Arnor

Fangorn.bonus: Ent models from this army list gain the Fearless special Rule. Additionally, Ent models are completely unaffected by any Magical Powers or special rules that would prevent them from moving or move them against their will (the only exception being Sorcerous Blast, but will suffer no further effects). Additionally, Ent models are immune to Nature's Wrath and the Wrath Of Bruinen Magical Powers.

Lothlórien.bonus: Friendly Lothlórien models gain the Resistant To Magic Special Rule

Minas Tirith.bonus: Friendly Gondor models from this army list increase their Courage value by 1.

Númenor.bonus: Friendly Númenor models from this army list increase their Courage value by 1.

Rivendell.bonus: Whilst within 6" of the army's leader, friendly Rivendell models may re-roll failed To Hit rolls when making shooting attacks in a turn in which they did not move.

Rohan.bonus: Friendly Rohan Cavalry models gain +1 Strength on a turn in which they charge.

The Dead Of Dunharrow.bonus: The King Of The Dead gains the Harbinger Of Evil special rule. Additionally, warbands from this army list that contain 8 or more models, do not need a Hero to be the Captain of the warband. Instead, one of the Warrior models within the warband takes on the role of the warband's Captain for the purpose of deployment.

The Fellowship.bonus:
As long as Frodo is alive and on the table (or escapes the board in Scenarios where this applies), all models from The Fellowship army list gain the Fearless special rule.
Additionally, a force that consists solely of models from The Fellowship army list will never be considered Broken if Frodo is alive and on the table (or escapes the board in Scenarios where this applies).

The Fiefdoms.bonus: Special Rules marked with * affect all models in this army list, not just the ones listed.

The Rangers.bonus: All models from this army list gain the Woodland Creature Special Rule, and the Rangers Of The North and Dúnedain may benefit from the Stand Fast! of Arathorn, Halbarad and Aragorn - Strider. Additionally, the Rangers Of The North and the Dúnedain increase their Attacks value to 2, while they have the Infantry keyword.

The Shire.bonus: Hobbit models from this army gain the Woodland Creature Special Rule.

Wildmen Of Drúadan.bonus: Models from this army list gain the Mountain Dweller Special Rule. Additionally, enemy models do not gain any benefits from the Stalk Unseen special rule, or any such special rules that give similar benefits, against models from this army list. Additionally, warbands from this army list, that contain between 9 and 12 Models do not need a Hero to be the captain of the warband. Instead, one of the Warrior models within the warband takes on the role of the warband's captain for the purpose of deployement.
